attributes.description:
Porsche 911 Targa 2.4 E 
1973: 600km
Price: R2 499 900

**********************
Available now at Prestige Marques is this beautiful F series 911 E Targa, fitted with the 2.4 MFI Engine.
This particular vehicle has undergone a full restoration that took an estimated two years. All the body panels are brand new from Dansk ensuring a total “new” car. The engine, gearbox and suspension has been rebuilt.
Please call Justin for full description of work done.




All Trade Ins Accepted

Finance Available

We Deliver Nationwide




Prestige Marques is an independent specialist that buy, sell, and source luxury, sport and supercars with a portfolio of brands for sale that includes Audi, Bentley, BMW, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Mercedes, Porsche, Aston Martin, Range Rover and Rolls-Royce
